content: k to end round 7 *k to 5 sts before m yo k1 yo k4 sm k4 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to end round 9 *k to 6 sts before m yo k1 yo k5 sm k5 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to end for sizes 5 6 repeat round 1 to 10 once more you should have 148 152 192 196 236 240 240 244 248 sts wan cheng phua © copyright 2023 knittygrittysg com yoke depth increases the following instructions do not apply to the bor marker do not remove the bor marker using removable stitch markers pm on the 7th st on the left and right of the current shoulder markers this would be the stitch in between the 2 yarn overs you should have placed 4 stitch markers remove the original markers after each row move the markers up to the st above there are three increase sections used to make the yoke depth each size uses a different combination of these increase sections sizes 7 8 9 only increase section a round 1 *k to marked st m1r k marked st m1l k to marked st m1r k marked st m1l* repeat * to * once k to end round 2 *k to marked st k marked st m1l k to marked st m1r k marked st* repeat * to * once k to end repeat these two rounds 1 2 3 more times for a total of 2 3 4 times you should have 264 280 296 sts all sizes increase section b round 1 *k to marked st m1r k marked st m1l k to marked st m1r k marked st m1l* repeat * to * once k to end round 2 k to end repeat these two rounds 2 6 1 5 0 4 4 6 9 more times for a total of 3 7 2 6 1 5 5 7 10 times you should have 172 208 208 244 244 280 304 336 376 sts all sizes increase section c round 1 *k to marked st k marked st m1l k to marked st m1r k marked st* repeat * to * once k to end round 2 k to end repeat these two rounds 13 10 16 14 23 22 21 20 17 more times for a total of 14 11 17 15 24 23 22 21 18 times you should have 228 252 276 304 340 372 392 420 448 sts k to end for 4 8 6 8 0 0 0 0 0 rounds wan cheng phua © copyright 2023 knittygrittysg com splitting for sleeves and body knit 27 30 35 39 44 48 56 58 62 sts for the front body slip next 44 48 50 54 62 68 72 80 84 sts on scrap yarn or stitch holder for sleeves cast on 6 6 6 6 6 6 10 12 12 sts for the underarms knit next
